newsitem.title: UK: Sainsbury shares down as large block placed.
newsitem.headline: Sainsbury shares down as large block placed.

text.p: Shares in J. Sainsbury Plc dropped on Tuesday, defying strength in other leading food retailers as a sizeable block of stock was placed below the market price, dealers said.
The stock was down 5p at 328 by 1351 GMT in active trade of 8.3 million shares.

"There was a block of three million knocking around earlier which was placed at 326p," said one market maker, adding "whoever bought it could have been left with half a million or so but it was nothing too drastic."
By contrast, Tesco Plc was up three percent and other leading supermarket shares rose as the market welcomed Tesco's results statement showing stabilising margins and steadying price inflation.
